page.title: 01A Day in my Life
page.content:
A DAY IN MY LIFE BY EMILY RATCLIFFE AGED 9
TUESDAY 2ND MAY 1985 AT 7:30 MUM WAKES ME UP.I SLOWLY SIT UP AND GET OUT OF BED.I PUT ON MY SLIPPERS WHICH ARE PINK AND GO DOWNSTAIRS.JONATHAN MY BROTHER HAS ALREADY LAID THE TABLE.SO I HAVE MY BREAKFAST.I HAVE SHREDDIES.AFTER I HAVE HAD MY BREAKFAST.I GO UPSTAIRS AND PUT MY SCHOOL UNIFORM ON.I GO DOWNSTAIRS AND HAVE A CUP OF TEA.AFTER I HAVE DRUNK MY DRINKI GO UPSTAIRS AND CLEAN MY TEETH.I USE SAINSBURYS TOOTHPASTE AND MY TOOTHBRUSH IS YELLOW. I GO DOWNSTAIRS AND GET MY BAG.I GET MY CRISPS AND LUNCH BOX AND PUT THEM IN MY BAG.THEN IPLAY THE PIANO.GUY MY OTHER BROTHER USELY GOES TO SCHOOL.WHEN I HAVE FINISHED I PUT MY SHOES AND COAT ON AND GET MY BAG.
